color: Yarrow comes in a wide range of colors including white, cream, yellow, purple, orange, pink and red.
height: This plant usually grows between 30 and 90 cm (1 to 3 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Achillea will grow best in well drained soil, with a pH between 5.5 and 7.0.

color: Aconite flowers come in shades of blue, purple, white, yellow, or even pink.
height: Aconite is a tall plant that grows from 30 cm (1 ft) to 180 cm (6 ft) high, depending on species.
soil_needs: Aconite will perform best in rich, moist and well drained soil, with a pH level between 5.0 and 6.0.

flower: Agapanthus (African Lily; Lily of the Nile)
color: Agapanthus flowers are usually in shades of blue, white and purple.
height: Agapanthus range in height from just 20 cm (8 inches) up to 1,8 m (6 ft) for larger varieties.
soil_needs: Agapanthus grow best in fertile, moist and well-drained soil. The pH of the soil is not so important. It can grow in acid, neutral, and alkaline soils.

color: Ageratum flowers come in shades of blue, purple, red, pink and white.
height: These plants can grow up to 60 cm (2 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Ageratum prefers moist, but well drained soil, with pH between 5.5 and 7.5.

color: Ajuga flowers are usually blue, purple and white.
height: Ajuga plants can grow up to 30 cm (1 ft) tall.
soil_needs: The plant grows best in moist and well drained soil, with a pH between 4.0 to 6.5. However, it can handle drought and dry soils.

color: Hollyhock blooms in a rainbow of colors including red, purple, pink, white, yellow and even almost black.
height: Hollyhocks range in height from 60 cm (2 ft) to 3 metres (10 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Alcea prefers rich and well drained soil, with a pH between 6.0 and 8.0.

color: Most Alliums come in shades of purple, but there are pink, blue, white and yellow varieties as well.
height: Alliums range in size from 15 cm (6 inches) to 180 cm (6 ft) giants.
soil_needs: Alliums are not fussy about their soil, so long as it is well drained.

flower: Alstroemeria (Peruvian lily; Lily of the Incas)
color: Alstroemeria flowers come in various colors, from orange, pink, rose, purple, red to yellow and white.
height: Peruvian lily range from dwarf species (20 cm or 8 inches tall) to the larger varieties that grow up to 120 cm or 4 ft in height.
soil_needs: The plant grows best in fertile, moist and well drained soil which is neutral or slightly acidic.

color: The flower color is usually some shade of pink and sometimes even white.
height: Amaryllis has stem that can reach 30 - 90 cm (1-3 ft) in height and each flower is 6-11 cm (2-4 inches) in diameter.
soil_needs: Amaryllis grows best in well drained and slightly acidic soil.

color: Anemone can be found in all colors of the rainbow.
height: Anemone can grow from 10 cm to 1,5 metres (4 inches to 5 ft) tall.
soil_needs: The plant likes moist, but well drained soil. Anemones have a wide pH tolerance, from acid to neutral and alkaline.

color: Anthurium plants range in color from red to pink, purple, yellow, white and green.
height: The plant can grow up to 90 cm (3 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Anthurium grows best in rich, well drained soil, with a pH between 5.5 and 6.5.

color: Columbine flowers are yellow, white, blue, red, pink, purple or a combination of these shades.
height: Columbine can grow up to 60 cm (2 ft) tall.
soil_needs: The plant grows best in moist and well drained soil, with a pH between 6.0 and 7.0. (slightly acidic to neutral).

color: These flowers come in shades of red, purple, pink, orange, yellow and white.
height: The plant reaches heights of 30 cm (1 ft) to 180 cm (6 ft).
soil_needs: Asclepias thrive best in well-drained soil, with a pH range of 5.0 to 7.0.

color: Asters can be white, blue, purple, and red, mostly with yellow centers.
height: Asters are 60-180 cm (2-6 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Asters grow best in moist and well drained soil, with a pH ranging from 5.5 to 7.5.

color: Astilbe flowers are available in white, pink and red.
height: The plants range in size from 30 cm (1 ft) to 150 cm (5 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Astilbes thrive best in moist and well drained soil, with a pH level between 6.0 and 8.0.

color: Banksia flowers are yellow, creamy, orange, red, green, violet or even brown.
height: Banksias range from 25 cm (1 ft) to 30 metres (100 feet) in height, depending on the species.
soil_needs: Banksias will grow in most soil types if given good drainage. However, they will perform best in sandy soils with a pH between 5.5 and 7.0.

color: Baptisia come in shades of blue, yellow and white, while many hybrids can be found in a wide variety of colors.
height: Baptisia range in size from 30 cm to 1,5 metres (1-5 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Baptisia prefers rich, well drained and slightly acidic soils.

color: Begonia appear in many different colors, but mostly in red, white, yellow, orange and pink.
height: Begonias can grow from 20 - 60 cm (8 inches to 2 ft).
soil_needs: Begonias prefer moist, well drained and more acidic soil. They have a low tolerance for drought.

color: Bellis come in shades of white, red, pink and purple. They usually have white petals and a yellow center,
height: Bellis plants are small, growing up to 20 cm (8 inches) in height.
soil_needs: This plant likes rich, moist and well drained soil. It is not fussy about the soil pH.

color: Bergenia come in shades of red, pink, purple and white.
height: Bergenia usually grow between 20-60 cm (8 inches to 2 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Bergenia prefers moist, but well drained soil. It tolerates a wide range of soil conditions.

color: Bougainvillea bracts come in shades of red, purple, yellow, pink, orange and white. Bougainvillea flowers are generally white.
height: Bougainvillea can grow from 60 cm to 12 metres (2 to 40 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Bougainvillea prefers moist, well drained and slightly acidic soil with a pH of 5.5 to 6.5.

color: Bouvardia come in shades of white, yellow, pink, orange and red.
height: Bouvardia can grow between 60 cm (2 ft) and 1,5 metres (5 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Bouvardia prefer well drained, sandy to clay loam soil.

color: Buddleia flowers come in shades of purple, blue, white, pink or red.
height: The plant can grow between 30 cm (1 ft) and 5 metres (16 ft) high, depending on species.
soil_needs: Buddleia will grow in almost any soil, but will perform best in moist and well drained soil, with a pH level between 6.0 and 7.0.

color: Calendula flowers are usually yellow and orange.
height: The plant may grow from 30 to 60 cm (1-2 ft) in height, depending on the variety and soil conditions.
soil_needs: The plant tolerates a wide range of soil conditions, but does best in rich, well-drained soils. The soil pH should be between 5.5 and 7.0.

color: Calluna flowers come in shades of red, purple, pink and white.
height: Calluna usually grow between 30-60 cm (1-2 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Calluna grow best in acidic, moist and well drained soil.

color: Camellia offer a large palette of colors, from white to yellow, pink red and purple.
height: Although its a slow grower, Camellia reaches a height of 1-6 metres (3-20 ft).
soil_needs: Camellia plants will perform best in moist and well drained soil, with a ph between 5.5 and 6.5.

color: Depending on the species, Campanula produces white, blue, purple, pink or lilac bells.
height: Some species grow just 5-10 cm (a few inches) tall, while others can grow 2 metres (6 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Campanula prefers rich, well drained soil.

color: Celosia flowers can be purple, red, orange, pink, gold, yellow and white.
height: The plants range from dwarf species to the larger varieties that grow up to 150 cm (5 ft) high.
soil_needs: Celosia prefers rich, moist and well drained soil. It thrives in clay and is drought tolerant once established. The soil should have a pH level between 6.0 and 7.0.

color: Centaurea flowers are traditionally blue in color but are also available in purple, pink, yellow and white.
height: Centaurea can reach 30 to 90 cm (1 to 3 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Centaurea plants prefer moist and well drained soil, with a pH level between 5.5 and 7.0.  However, they are very adaptable and will grow in nutritionally poor soils.

color: The plant comes in rainbow of colors, but the most common are red, yellow, white and purple.
height: Chrysanthemums range in size from 30 cm (1 ft) to 120 cm (4 ft).
soil_needs: The plant likes moist and well drained soil. The optimal soil pH is between 6.0 and 7.0.

color: Clarkia flowers come in a range of colors including red, purple, pink, orange and white.
height: This plant can reach up to 150 cm (5 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Clarkia grows best in rich, moist, well drained and loamy soils, with a pH between 6.0 and 8.5.

color: Clematis flowers offer a wide range of different colors.
height: Clematis range in size from 30 cm (1 ft) to 12 metres (40 ft), depending on species.
soil_needs: Clematis prefers moist and well drained soil. The ideal soil ph is between 5.5 and 7.0.

color: Convallaria blooms are usually white, but sometimes pink.
height: Convallaria reaches about 30 cm (1 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Convallaria will grow best in rich, moist and well drained soil. The plant is not fussy about the soil pH.

color: Although usually yellow in color, Coreopsis flowers come in different colors including red, orange, pink, maroon,  lavender. Bi-colored flowers are also possible.
height: The different varieties of this plant range in height from 15 cm (6 inches) to 120 cm (4 ft).
soil_needs: Coreopsis will thrive in almost any type of soil that is well drained.

color: Cosmos flowers come in amazing variety of bright colors, from pink, orange and scarlet to yellow and white.
height: Cosmos can grow between 30-120 cm (1-4 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Cosmos likes moist, but well drained soil, with a pH between 5.0 and 8.0.

color: Crocosmia flowers are usually in shades of red and orange, but can also be yellow.
height: The plant can grow up to 60 cm (2 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Crocosmia likes fertile, moist and well drained soil of any pH. However, it will grow in a wide range of conditions.

color: Crocus flowers are white, purple, yellow, cream and there are even striped varieties.
height: Crocus can reach between 20 and 30 cm (1 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Although Crocus is tolerant of a wide range of soils, it will grow best in a well drained soil, with a pH between 6.0 and 8.0.

color: Cyclamen flowers are usually white, red, rose, purple or pink.
height: Cyclamens are relatively small plants growing up to 15 cm (6 inches).
soil_needs: The plants prefer organically rich and well drained soil. Grow them in moist, but not waterlogged soil.

color: Cymbidium comes in various colors such as white, green, yellow, brown, orange, pink and red.
height: Cymbidium range in size, from dwarf species to some reaching 1,5 metres (5 ft) in height.
soil_needs: This plant can grow in almost any kind of soil that is well drained.

color: Dahlias bloom in all colors, except blue.
height: Dahlias vary in height, from the 40 cm (1 ft) right up to 2 metres (7 ft).
soil_needs: Dahlia performs best in rich, moist and well drained soil that is slightly acidic.

color: It comes in many colors including red, purple, orange, pink, yellow and white.
height: The plant grows up to 15 cm (6 inches) in height.
soil_needs: Delosperma likes dry, sandy and poor soils with good drainage. It prefers soils with a pH level between 6.0 and 8.0.

color: Delphiniums come in several colors, including blue, red, pink, white, violet, and yellow, but blue is the most common color.
height: Delphinium flower spikes can reach 30 cm to 180 cm (1 to 6 ft) tall.
soil_needs: The plant grows best in moist, but well drained soil. The pH of the soil should be neutral to slightly alkaline.

color: Most species are white, but some are pink or red.
height: The plant range in height from 30 cm (1 ft) to 4 metres (13 ft).
soil_needs: Deutzia prefer moist and well drained soil. The plant can grow in a wide range of pH conditions.

color: Dianthus flowers come in shades of red, pink, purple and white or combinations of these colours. Cultivated species are available in a wider range of colors.
height: Their height range from just 10 cm to 90 cm (4 inches to 3 ft).
soil_needs: Well drained.

color: Diascia flowers come in shades of pink, purple, orange, and white, each with a contrasting yellow throat.
height: The plant grows between 30 cm (1 ft) and 60 cm (2 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Diascia grows best in soil that is fertile, moist, well drained and slightly acidic, with a pH range of 5.5 to 6.5.

color: Dicentra flowers are usually red, pink and white.
height: Dicentra usually reach 90 cm (3 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Dicentra prefer moist, but well drained soil. The soil should be organic and slightly acidic.

color: Dietes flowers are white to creamy yellow in color, with brown, yellow and purple markings on the tepals.
height: This plant grows up to 150 cm (5 ft) tall.
soil_needs: These plants are not fussy about soil type, but will perform best in rich, moist and well drained soil.

color: Digitalis flowers appear in shades of white, yellow, pink, red and purple.
height: Foxgloves are tall beauties which can grow up to 180 cm (6 ft), depending on variety.
soil_needs: The plant grows best in moist and well drained soil, with a pH between 6 and 7.5.

color: Dracula plants come in various colors, such as red, purple, lavender, yellow and white. They range from nearly black to white.
height: The plant can grow up to 60 cm (2 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Dracula requires moist, well-drained soil and high humidity. The recommended soil pH is 5.5 to 7.0, depending on species.

color: Dryas flowers are usually white or cream, with yellow centre.
height: Dryas is a small plant, growing only 20 cm (8 inches) in height.
soil_needs: The plant can grow in many different soil types and pH levels, but requires good drainage.

color: Echeveria has beautiful leaves and stunning flowers in a large variety of colors.
height: Echeverias can grow from 10 cm to 60 cm (4 inches to 2 ft) high.
soil_needs: Echeverias grow best in well drained soil, with a slightly acidic pH.

color: Echinacea flowers come in shades of white, yellow, orange, pink, purple, red and brown, depending on variety. The most common are the purple ones.
height: Coneflowers will grow between 30 cm (1 ft) and 120 cm (4 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Echinacea likes medium moisture and well drained soil, with a pH between 6.0 and 7.0. In the wild, they usually grow in poor and rocky soil and can tolerate more alkaline conditions.

color: Echinops flowers are mostly blue, but also you can find them in white, purple and blue-grey. Their long stems are gray-green in color.
height: Echinops can grow from 50 cm to 1,5 metres (2 to 5 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Echinops grows best in well drained soil and prefers a soil of pH 5,5 to 7.

color: Emilia flowers come in shades of purple, red and orange.
height: Tassel Flower usually grows from 30 cm (1 ft) to 60 cm (2 ft). and possibly up to 90 cm (3 ft) tall.
soil_needs: It is not fussy about soil pH, but the soil must be well drained.

flower: Epimedium (Barrenwort; Bishop's hat; Horny Goat Weed)
color: Epimedium flowers come in many stunning colors, including white, red, pink, purple, yellow and orange, as well as bi-colored varieties.
height: Epimedium can grow up to 60 cm (2 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Epimedium prefers rich and moist soil, with a pH between 5.5 to 7.0. However, it will adapt to a wide range of conditions and survive in nearly any shady location.

color: Epiphyllum flowers are usually white, sometimes with yellow or pink sepals. However, most Epiphyllums grown today are hybrids and may be red, purple, pink, orange and yellow.
height: Epiphyllum can reach 10 m (30 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Epiphyllum prefers rich and well drained soil. For majority of plants, the ideal soil pH is slightly acidic with a pH range of 5.5 to 6.5.

color: Flower clusters are covered with orange, pink, yellow and white blossoms.
height: Foxtail Lilies are tall plants that reach 2,5 metres (8ft) or less in height, depending on the species.
soil_needs: Eremurus prefers well drained soil that is acid, alkaline or neutral.

color: Eryngium flowers are usually blue, purple, green or whitish.
height: They can range from 30 cm (1 ft) to 150 cm (5 ft) tall, depending on the species.
soil_needs: Sea Holly plants need good drainage and plenty of sun. They are not particular about soil pH and will tolerate poor and sandy soils. The plant has a long taproot, which makes it drought tolerant.

color: Erysimum usually come in yellow, but may also be red, orange and mauve.
height: Erysimum can grow up to 90 cm (3 ft) high.
soil_needs: Erysimum prefers well drained soil, with a pH between 5.0 and 8.0.

color: Erythronium flowers come in shades of yellow, purple, pink, red and white.
height: Erythronium can grow up to 60 cm (2 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Erythronium grows best in moist and well drained soil. It is not fussy about soil pH, but is intolerant of dry conditions.

color: Their color ranges from yellow to orange.
height: The plants grow up to 30 cm (1 ft) tall, but some species have been known to grow taller.
soil_needs: In general, these plants grow in a range of soils, but prefer loamy or clay soils. They thrive in well-drained, poor soils with relatively little organic matter, preferring neutral to slightly alkaline soils.

plant_type: Annuals, Cactus - Succulents, Perennials, Shrubs, Trees
color: Euphorbia bloom beautifully in almost every color imaginable.
height: Spurges range in size from 30 cm to 20 metres (1 ft to 66 ft), depending on species.
soil_needs: Well drained.

color: The flowers come in white, cream, blue, purple, pink and lilac.
height: Depending on the variety, Eustoma will grow from 15 cm (6 inches) to 80 cm (3 ft) in height.
soil_needs: The plant performs best in rich, moist and well drained soil, with a pH between 6.5 and 7.0.

color: Felicia flowers are blue, white, lilac or purple. Most of them have yellow centers, with the exception of the Felicia heterophylla which is all-blue in color.
height: Felicia can grow up to 50 cm (20 inches) in height.
soil_needs: Felicia grows in almost any well drained soil.

color: Forsythia flowers only come in one color - yellow.
height: Forsythia grows between 60 cm (2 ft) and 6 metres (20 ft) tall, depending on species.
soil_needs: The soil should be moist, but well drained and rich in organic matter. Forsythia grows in low-acidic, neutral and even moderately alkaline soils.

color: Freesia comes in white, yellow, orange, red, pink, mauve, lavender and purple colors.
height: Freesia can grow up to 40 cm (1 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Moist, but well drained.

flower: Fritillaria (Checkered Lily; Snakes Head; Crown Imperial)
color: Fritillaria come in variety of colors, from bright yellow to orange, green and deep red.
height: Fritillaria can reach 30 cm to 1,5 metres (1-5 ft) in height, depending on variety.
soil_needs: The plant requires a well drained soil.

color: Fuchsia develops white, yellow, orange, red and purple colored flowers, composed of red sepals and purple petals.
height: Fuchsia can grow from 15 cm (6 inches) to 15 metres (50 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Fuchsia prefers moist, but well drained soil, with a pH between 5.5 and 6.5.

color: Gaillardia flowers come in various shades of red, orange, yellow, purple and brown. The bicolor blooms are pretty intense.
height: Plants belonging to the Gaillardia genus range in height from 15 cm (6 inches) to 90 cm (3 ft).
soil_needs: Gaillardia plants grow best in moist and well drained soil, with a pH between 5.5 and 7.0. However, they will tolerate drought, heat, poor and sandy soils, but heavy clay soil will probably kill them.

color: Unlike many other flowers, Galanthus are one of the few flowers that only come in one color - creamy white.
height: These tiny flowers grow up to 25 cm (10 inches) high.
soil_needs: Galanthus prefers moist and well drained soil of pH 6.0 to 8.0.

color: The most of them are white (or a related color like ivory or cream) and some of them are yellow.
height: Gardenia can grow between 60 cm (2 ft) and 6 metres (20 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Gardenia likes moist, but well drained soil. The ideal soil pH is between 5 and 6.

color: Gazania flowers come in shades of yellow, orange, pink, red and white. The colors of the petals are bright and unique.
height: Gazania plants can grow up to 30 cm (1 ft) high.
soil_needs: Gazania will grow best in well-drained soil in full sun, with a pH level between 5.5 and 7.0.

color: Most of the species have beautiful, vivid blue flowers, but white, yellow, purple and red varieties are also available.
height: The plants range from dwarf species just 5 cm (2 inches) tall to the larger varieties that grow up to 90 cm (3 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Gentiana will grow best in rich, moist and well drained soil, with a pH between 5.0 and 7.5.

color: Geranium flowers come in shades of white, red, blue, purple and pink.
height: Geranium plants grow between 15-120 cm (6 inches to 4 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Geranium will grow in almost any kind of soil. The ideal soil pH should be mildly acidic.

flower: Gerbera (African daisy; Transvaal daisy; Barberton daisy)
color: Gerbera flowers come in many different colors (white, red, yellow, orange, pink and purple), except for blue.
height: The plants are 20-45 cm (8-18 inches) tall. Gerbera flower heads vary from 7 to 12 centimeters (3 to 5 inches) in diameter.
soil_needs: Gerberas prefer rich and well drained soil, with lots of added organic matter. They grow best in a slightly acidic soil with a pH of 5.5 - 6.5.

color: Geum comes in various colors, including white, yellow, orange, pink and red.
height: The plant can grow up to 60 cm (2 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Geums prefer rich, moist and well drained soil, with a pH level between 5.5 and 7.0.

color: They come in beautiful colors, ranging from white, yellow, pink and lavender, to red, purple and even green.
height: Gladiolus can grow between 60 to 180 cm (2 to 6 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Gladioli prefer moist and well drained soil, with a pH between 6.0 and 7.0.

color: Grevillea may be red, yellow, orange, purple and white.
height: Grevillea range from small shrubs around 50 cm (20 inches) high to large trees up to 35 metres (115 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Grevillea grows in all types of soil, but prefers well-drained soil.

color: These plants have small white or pink flowers.
height: Gypsophila range in size from 15 cm (6 inches) to 1 m (30 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Gypsophila prefer calcium-rich, alkaline soils.

color: Hamamelis flowers range in color from deep red to yellow.
height: The plant grows between 150 cm (5 ft) and 8 m (26 ft) in height, depending on the species.
soil_needs: Hamamelis likes fertile, moist and well drained soil, with a ph between 4.5. and 7.0. It tolerates deep soils over chalk.

color: Helenium flowers come in shades of yellow, orange, red and brown.
height: Helenium can grow up to 150 cm (5 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Helenium likes moist and well drained soil, and will tolerate most pH levels.

color: Although yellow is the original color, Sunflowers come in shades of yellow, cream, red, orange and purple that contrast with deep brown centers.
height: Although there are some dwarf species that grow 30-60 cm (1-2 ft) tall, Sunflowers are usually tall plants which can grow up to 3 metres (10 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Sunflowers grow best in fertile, well drained soil, with a pH range between 6.0 and 7.5.

flower: Heliconia (Lobster Claw; False Bird of Paradise)
color: The colors of the flowers range in hues of red, orange, pink, yellow and green.
height: Heliconias can vary in height from as small as 60 cm (2 ft) to 6 metres (20 ft), depending on species.
soil_needs: Heliconia prefers rich and well drained soil that stays consistently moist. The optimal pH range is between 5.0 and 7.0.

color: Hellebores come in various colors, from purple to pink, green, yellow, white and even black.
height: These plants range in size from 30 cm (1 ft) to 1,2 metres (4 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Hellebores prefer rich, moist and well-drained soil. They are tolerant of most soil types, but avoid planting them in dry or waterlogged soil.

color: This plant comes in a variety of colors, from red, orange, pink and yellow to white, purple and blue.
height: It depends on variety. These beauties can reach heights up to 4 metres (13 ft).
soil_needs: Hibiscus likes moist, but well drained soil, with a neutral to slightly acidic pH.

color: Hippeastrum comes in red, pink, salmon, orange, white, yellow and pale green colors.
height: Hippeastrum can grow from 30 cm to 90 cm (1 to 3 ft).
soil_needs: Hippeastrum will grow in moist and well drained soil that is acidic, alkaline or neutral.

color: Hosta flowers are usually white, whitish with lavender lines, or purple.
height: Some varieties are short, while some varieties can grow up to 180 cm (6 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Hosta can tolerate just about any soil, but does best in rich, moist and well-drained soil.

color: Hoya flowers are mostly white, but are also available in shades of pink, red, purple, orange and green.
height: Hoya plants range in size from 10 cm (4 inches) to 3 meters (10 ft) in height.
soil_needs: The plant will grow best in moist and well drained soil, with a pH between 5.0 and 6.5.

color: This plant comes in many color varieties, such as purple, blue, white, yellow, red, pink and orange.
height: Hyacinth can grow up to 30 cm (1 ft) in height.
soil_needs: These plants will perform well in moist and well drained soil that is neutral to slightly acidic.

color: Hydrangea flowers come in shades of blue, purple, white, pink and red.
height: Hydrangea species range in size from 60 cm to 12 metres (2 ft to 40 ft) in height, depending on species.
soil_needs: Hydrangea grows best in moist, but well drained soil.

color: Hypericum flowers are generally yellow.
height: Hypericum can reach a height between 30 cm (1 ft) and 2 m (7 ft), depending on species.
soil_needs: Hypericum grows best in moist and well drained soil that has a pH between 5.5 and 7.0.

color: Hypoxis flowers are bright yellow in color.
height: Hypoxis plants usually grow to a height of 20 cm (8 inches).
soil_needs: Hypoxis grows best in moist areas with full sun. Most species are not fussy about the soil pH.

color: Iberis flowers are usually white, but can also be pink or lilac.
height: The plant can reach a height between 15 cm (6 inches) and 30cm (1 ft).
soil_needs: Iberis likes rich, moist and well drained soil. Some species can grow in nutritionally poor soil.

color: Impatiens come in variety of colors, including blue, purple, orange, red, pink, white and yellow.
height: Impatiens are short plants that usually dont grow larger than 30 cm (1 ft).
soil_needs: They prefer rich, moist and well drained soil, with a pH between 6.0 and 7.5.

color: Ipomoea come in many colors, including white, red, blue, purple and yellow.
height: Ipomoea vary in size, ranging from 20 cm (8 inches) to 4,5 metres (15 ft) in height.
soil_needs: The plant is very adaptable and will grow in almost any type of soil that is well drained.

color: Iris comes in a rainbow of colors, such as blue, purple, white, yellow, pink, orange, brown, red and black.
height: Irises are available in different sizes, which range from dwarf species (5 cm or 2 inches) to much larger varieties (130 cm or 4 ft).
soil_needs: Iris performs best in moist and well drained soil that is slightly acidic.

flower: Ixora (Jungle Flame; Flame of the Woods)
color: Ixora comes in bright red, orange, pink, yellow and white colors. Red color is the most popular one.
height: Ixora can grow up to 200 cm (7 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Ixora likes moist, but well drained soil. It must be planted in rich, acidic soil because alkaline soil can result in yellow foliage.

color: Jacaranda flowers come in shades of purple and blue.
height: Jacarandas can grow between 1 and 10 metres (3-32 ft) tall, depending on species.
soil_needs: Although Jacaranda tolerates a wide variety of soils, it grows best in sandy soil, with a slightly acidic pH range.

color: The flowers are blue or purple in color,
height: Jasione can grow up to 50 cm (2 ft) in height.
soil_needs: This plant needs to be in well drained soil.

color: Most of the Jasmine species bear white or pale yellow flowers.
height: Growing approximately 30-60 cm (1-2 ft) per year, Jasmines can reach 150 cm (5 ft) tall as a shrub, and over 10 m (33 ft) long as a vine.
soil_needs: Jasmine likes fertile and moist, but well drained soil.

color: Justicia grow in shades of red, orange, pink, yellow, white and cream.
height: The smaller types grow in mounds about 50 cm (2 ft) high, while others are more shrublike and grow up to 2,5 metres (8 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Justicia prefers well drained, acidic to neutral soil.

color: Kalanchoe comes in variety of colors, including orange, pink, red, white and many variations thereof.
height: Most species are less than 1 m (3 ft), with the exception of Kalanchoe beharensis from Madagascar which can reach the height of 6 m (20 ft).
soil_needs: Kalanchoe plants do best in well drained soil, with a pH between 5.0 and 6.5.

color: Kalmia flowers are usually pink, purple, lavender or white.
height: Kalmia range from 25 cm (1 ft) to 5 metres (16 ft) in height.
soil_needs: The plant prefers moist, well drained and acidic soil.

color: Kerria flowers are bright yellow.
height: Kerria can grow up to 3 metres (10 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Kerria japonica grows best in moist, well drained and slightly acidic soil.

flower: Kniphofia (Red Hot Pokers; Torch Lily; Tritoma)
color: Kniphofia blooms in shades of red, orange, yellow and cream. They change color as the flower matures, which results in a bicolor look.
height: Kniphofia can grow up to 2 metres (7 ft) high.
soil_needs: The plant will grow in moist and well drained soil that is neutral, alkaline or acidic.

color: Kolkwitzia flowers are soft pink to white, each with a yellow troat.
height: Kolkwitzia amabilis can grow up to 3 metres (10 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Kolkwitzia amabilis prefers fertile and moist, but well drained soil. It can tolerate acid to alkaline soil, with a pH between 5.0 and 8.0.

color: Kunzea flowers come in various colors including white, yellow, pink, purple and red.
height: They range in size from small ground covers to 10 metre (32 ft) trees.
soil_needs: Kunzea prefers moist and well drained soil, but will grow in a variety of soils with a pH range of 6.0 to 8.0.

color: Lantana come in a rainbow of colors including red, orange, pink, lavender, yellow, white or a mixture of these and will often display different colors in the center and on the edges.
height: Lantana range in size from 25 cm to 1,2 metres (10 inches to 4 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Lantana prefers moist, but well drained soil, with a pH between 6.5 and 7.5.

color: Sweet Pea flowers come in a wide variety of colors, including white, cream, yellow, red, scarlet, pink, salmon, magenta, purple, lavender and blue.
height: These plants range from 30 cm (1 ft) to 280 cm (9 ft) tall, depending on variety.
soil_needs: The plant grows in moist and well drained soil and will survive in acid, alkaline and neutral soil.

color: Lavender comes in a wide range of purple colors, but also can be found in white, pink and blue colors.
height: Lavender can grow from 30 to 90 cm (1 to 3 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Well drained.

color: This plant has small, yellow clustered florets.
height: The plant reaches about 30 cm (1 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Leontopodium needs good drainage and pH between 6.5 and 7.5 (slightly alkaline to medium acidity).

color: Leucojum has white flowers with faint green tips.
height: Leucojum can grow up to 60 cm (2 ft) high.
soil_needs: These plants are not fussy about soil type, but they bloom best in a soil that's rich, moist and well-drained.

color: Lewisia flowers come in shades of white, pink, purple, orange and red.
height: Lewisia is a small plant, growing up to 30 cm (1 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Lewisia prefers moderately fertile and well drained soil, with a ph value between 5.0 and 8.0. It is drought tolerant and thrives in poor and dry soils.

color: Liatris blooms in shades of purple, lavender, pink, white, rose and violet.
height: Blazing Stars can grow up to 150 cm (5 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Liatris will grow best in sandy or loamy soil, with a pH between 5.5 and 7.5. Plant Liatris in tough soil conditions with good drainage.

color: Lilies come in a large variety of colors and the most common are white, yellow, orange and red.
height: Some species are small, about 30 cm or 1 ft (such as Dwarf Asiatic Lilies), while others can reach the height of 270 cm or 9 ft (Lilium Superbum).
soil_needs: Lilies prefer moist and well drained soil, and they will perform best in soil that is slightly acidic.

color: The flowers are blue, purple, pink, yellow or white.
height: The plant can grow up to 90 cm (3 ft) in height.
soil_needs: The plant prefers rich and well-drained soil in full sun. It is not particular as to soil pH, but grows best in sandy soils.

color: Lobelia flowers come in shades of blue, white, pink, red and purple.
height: The plant ranges in height from 15 cm (6 inches)  to 150 cm (5 ft).
soil_needs: Lobelia prefers rich, moist and well drained soil, with a pH level from 6.0 to 7.5.

color: Lupin flowers are usually blue or purple, but sometimes pink, yellow and white.
height: Lupinus can grow from 30 cm to 1,5 m (1 to 5 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Lupinus grows best in well drained, neutral to slightly acidic soil.

color: Lycoris flowers come in shades of red, pink, orange, white and yellow.
height: Lycoris grows to 60 cm (2 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Lycoris prefers soils that are rich, medium moist and well-drained. They are not fussy about the soil pH.

color: Magnolia produces white, purple, pink and yellow flowers, depending on variety.
height: The trees can grow to a height of 20 metres (65 ft), while shrubs are smaller and are 2,5 - 6 metres (8-20 ft) high.
soil_needs: Magnolia grows best in rich, moist, well drained and acidic soil. Magnolia species can tolerate loam, clay and sandy soils.

color: The flowers are usually pink, purple and white.
height: This plant can grow up to 150 cm (5 ft) in height, but most of the species are smaller than that.
soil_needs: Mallow likes rich and well-drained soil, even slightly dry and poor. Most species prefer neutral to slightly acidic pH.

color: Mandevilla come in shades of red, pink, white and yellow.
height: Mandevilla can grow up to 6 metres (20 ft) in height, or even more.
soil_needs: Mandevilla prefer rich, sandy and well drained soil with organic material added.

color: Monarda flowers come in shades of red, pink, purple and white.
height: Different varieties vary in height, from dwarf species barely 25 cm (10 inches) tall, to "giants" that reach about 1,5 metres (5 ft) high.
soil_needs: Monarda prefers well drained soil, with a pH from 6.0 to 7.0.

color: Muscari flowers are commonly blue. However, the white, pink and yellow types can also be found.
height: Muscari is a small plant that grows between 10 cm (4 inches) and 25 cm (10 inches) tall.
soil_needs: The plant grows best in moist and well drained soil, with a pH between 6.0 and 7.0.

color: Flower colors can be blue, pink or white, with a yellow center.
height: Myosotis can reach about 25 cm (1 ft) in height.
soil_needs: The plant performs best in rich, moist and well drained soil, with a pH between 5.5 and 7.5.

color: The flowers are most commonly white.
height: Myrtle can grow up to 6 metres (20 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Grow Myrtle in moist and well drained soil.

color: Narcissus flowers are usually white and yellow.
height: Dwarf species can reach a height of 10 cm (4 inches), while some species can grow to 80 cm (3 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Narcissi prefer rich and moist, but well-drained soil and will grow best in soil that is neutral to slightly acidic (pH of 6.0 - 7.0).

flower: Nelumbo (Lotus; Indian lotus; Sacred lotus; American lotus)
color: Nelumbo nucifera has white or pink flowers, while Nelumbo lutea has yellow ones.
height: The leaves and flowers of Nelumbo nucifera are held on stems up to 2 metres (7 ft) tall. The Nelumbo lutea are almost the same size, ranging from 80 cm to 1,5 metres (3-5 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Both species need rich and loamy soil.

color: Flowers come in shades of blue, purple, red, pink, orange, mauve, yellow, cream and white.
height: The half-inch flowers bloom on plants that grow up to 60 cm (2 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Moist, but well drained.

color: Nemophila flowers vary in color from a true blue to a definite purple.
height: Nemophila is a small plant, rarely growing over 30 cm (1 ft) high.
soil_needs: The plant likes rich, moist and well drained soil. It prefers soil with a pH of 5.5 to 8.0.

color: Nepeta come in shades of blue, purple, white and even pink and yellow.
height: Nepeta can grow between 20 cm and 2 metres (8 inches to 7 ft) high, depending on variety.
soil_needs: Nepeta prefers moist and well drained soil, which is acidic to neutral (soil pH from 5.5 to 7.0).

color: Nerine flowers come in shades of pink, orange, red and white.
height: Nerine reaches 60 cm (2 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Nerine likes moist and well drained soil. It is not particular as to soil type or pH.

color: Nigella flowers are usually white, yellow, pink or blue.
height: Nigella grows between 20 cm (8 inches) and 90 cm (3 ft) in height.
soil_needs: The plant prefers good drainage and average soil with a pH value between 6.0 to 7.0

color: The plants color is gray-green, and flowers are usually white or slightly pink.
height: Obregonia is small-sized plant, about 15 cm (6 inches) in height.
soil_needs: Obregonia performs best in well drained soil with little organic material and neutral pH.

color: Oenothera grow in yellow, pink and white colors.
height: Oenothera vary in size, from 15 cm to 2,5 metres (6 inches to 8 ft) high.
soil_needs: Well drained.

color: Opuntia flowers are usually yellow, sometimes red and pink, and rarely white.
height: Opuntias vary in height, from dwarf species (20 cm or 8 inches) to giants (4,5 metres or 15 ft).
soil_needs: Opuntia need well drained soil that is acid, alkaline or neutral.

color: Ornithogalum flowers come in white, yellow and orange.
height: The plant can grow between 10 and 60 cm (4 inches to 2 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Ornithogalum prefers moist, but well drained soil. You can grow it in any sandy or loam soil.

color: Osteospermum flowers come in numerous colors and shades, including blue, purple, mauve, pink, yellow, white and cream.
height: Osteospermum reaches up to 60 cm (2 ft) tall, depending on species.
soil_needs: These sun-loving plants prefer well drained soil of average fertility. They do not appear to be fussy about soil pH.

color: Oxalis flowers come in shades of yellow, pink, white and purple.
height: Oxalis plants can reach 7 to 30 cm (3 to 12 inches) in height.
soil_needs: Oxalis prefers moist and well drained soil, but does not like to be in a soggy spot. They have no special soil requirements.

color: Peonies produce red, pink, purple, white and yellow flowers.
height: Peonies grow from 60 to 120 cm (2-4 ft) tall. However, tree peonies can reach to 3 metres (10 ft).
soil_needs: Paeonia likes moist and well drained soil, with a ph level from 6.0 to 7.5.

color: Papaver flowers bloom in a range of colors, from white, yellow, pink, orange and red to purple and deep plum.
height: Papaver usually grows between 30-90 cm (1-3 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Papaver likes well drained soil that is acidic, neutral or alkaline.

color: Though a wide range of colors exist, the most common are white and blue.
height: Sizes vary depending on the variety, from dwarf species (60 cm or 2 ft) to climbers that can reach 9 metres (30 ft).
soil_needs: Passiflora likes soil that is fertile, moist and well drained. Soil pH can be anywhere between 6.0 to 7.5.

color: Penstemon flowers come in shades of white, yellow, blue, red and purple.
height: This plant grows between 30 cm (1 ft) and 120 cm (4 ft) high.
soil_needs: Most Penstemons require moist and well-drained soil. They usually grow on poor, rocky or sandy soils. This plant does not seem to be fussy about the soil pH, but prefers soil with a pH from 5.5 to 7.0.

color: Perovskia flowers come in shades of purple and blue.
height: Perovskia can grow up to 150 cm (5 ft) tall.
soil_needs: This plant does not need a rich soil to grow well, but good drainage is needed. Perovskia thrives in dry soil and requires little water once established. It tolerates a wide range of soil ph.

color: Petunias are available in almost all colors. The most common are white, yellow, pink, red and purple.
height: Petunia can grow from 15 cm to 120 cm (6 inches to 4 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Petunia prefer fertile, moist, but well drained soil, with a pH between 6.0 and 7.0.

color: There are many different color varieties available - white, yellow, pink, purple, red, lavender, rose, magenta.
height: Phlox can be found in different sizes from dwarf species only around 10 cm (4 inches) in height to some reaching 120 cm (4 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Moist, but well drained.

flower: Platycodon (Balloon Flower; Chinese Bellflower; Japanese Bellflower)
color: Platycodon come in purple, blue, pink and white.
height: This plant can grow nearly 60 cm (2 feet) tall.
soil_needs: Platycodon will grow in any good well-drained soil, but prefers sandy soil. It will do best in a slightly acidic soil pH.

color: Plumeria flowers can be found in shades of white, yellow, pink and red.
height: Sizes vary depending on the variety. Some species can grow up to 10 metres (32 ft) in height, but dwarf varieties are also available.
soil_needs: Plumeria prefers moist, but well drained soil that is slightly acidic.

color: Primula flowers come in a wide range of colors, from blue, purple, green and orange to pink, red, yellow and white.
height: Primula plants can grow up to 60 cm (2 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Primulas prefer moist, but well drained soil and grow best in neutral or slightly acidic soil.

color: Protea flowers come in shades of white, purple, red, orange, yellow and green.
height: Protea range in height from tiny shrubs to tall trees of 10 meters (33 ft).
soil_needs: The majority of species prefer well drained, sandy and slightly acidic soil (pH 5.5 to 7.0).

color: Prunus flowers come in shades of white, pink and red.
height: The species range in height from 1,5 metres to 12 metres (5 to 40 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Prunus likes moist and well drained soil that is acidic, neutral or alkaline.

color: Pulmonaria flowers come in shades of blue, purple, pink and white.
height: Pulmonaria can grow up to 30 cm (1 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Pulmonaria likes moist and well drained soil. Most of the species thrive best in soil with a pH in the 7.0 to 7.5 range.

color: Quesnelia flowers come in red, blue, pink and yellow.
height: Quesnelia plants can grow up to 60 cm (2 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Moist, but well drained.

color: Rafflesia flowers are reddish brown with white marks on its petals.
height: Rafflesia can reach up to 1 m (more than 3 ft) in diameter.
soil_needs: Rafflesia is a parasitic plant and depends completely upon its host, so it doesn't need any soil. Anyway, it has no roots, leaves or stem.

color: Ranunculus colors are mostly in range from white, yellow and gold to pink and red.
height: Ranunculus can reach a height of 20-60 cm (8 inches to 2 ft), depending on species.
soil_needs: Ranunculus prefer moist, but well drained soil. The pH level of the soil should be slightly acidic.

color: Rhododendron blooms in various colors, from pure white to red, orange and pink to gold and purple.
height: Rhododendron grows from low ground covers and medium sizes shrubs to tree-size plants, from 30 cm to 4,5 metres (1 to 15 ft) high.
soil_needs: Rhododendrons will perform best in moist and well drained soil, with a pH level between 4.5 and 6.0.

color: Rondeletia flowers are white, yellow, pink and red, sometimes with yellow centers.
height: The plant can grow up to 4,5 metres (15 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Rondeletia will grow best in rich, moist and well drained soil that is slightly acidic.

color: Roses range in color from white through various tones of yellow and pink to dark crimson and maroon.
height: Roses range in size from dwarf species (60 cm or 2 ft) to climbers that can reach 12 metres (40 ft).
soil_needs: This plant grows best in moist and well drained soil, with a pH level between 5.5 and 7.0.

color: Rudbeckias are mostly yellow, but also can be red and orange, with central cones that can be green, black and brown.
height: Rudbeckia plant can grow up to 30-120 cm (1-4 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Rudbeckia likes moist and well drained soil that is neutral, alkaline or acidic.

color: Salvia blooms in a range of colors, from traditional dark blue to light blue, red, pink, and white.
height: They grow from 30 cm to 180 cm (1 to 6 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Salvia grows best in moist, but well drained soil, with a pH between 6.0 and 7.0.

color: The flowers are orange or yellow.
height: This plant grows up to 90 cm (3 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Sandersonia aurantiaca prefers sandy or loamy soil that is moist, well drained and slightly acidic.

color: The flowers are usually white, but may be yellow, purple, pink and red.
height: This plant usually reaches about 30 cm (1 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Appropriate soil type depends on species. In general, these plants like moist and well drained soil, with a pH level between 6.0. and 8.0.

color: This beautiful flower comes in different colors such as blue, purple, white, yellow, pink and red.
height: Scabiosa range in height from 15 cm (6 inches) to 60 cm (2 ft).
soil_needs: Scabiosa grows best in rich soil with good drainage, and with plenty of sunlight. It can be grown in soils with a pH range from 5.0 to 7.5.

color: Scilla comes in shades of blue, purple and white. The blue ones are very pretty, some of the best blues to be found among flowers.
height: Scilla can grow up to 60 cm (2 ft) high However, some species are less than 10 cm (4 inches) tall.
soil_needs: Scilla likes rich and well drained soil, with a pH level between 6.0 and 8.0. It will not grow well in waterlogged soils.

color: Sedum flowers come in a rainbow of colors, from red, orange, pink and purple to yellow and white. Foliage can be found in a number of colors, too.
height: Sedums can grow from 10-90 cm (4 inches to 3 ft), depending on variety.
soil_needs: Sedum plants prefer well drained soil that is neutral, alkaline or acidic.

color: Goldenrods come in a bright, golden-yellow color.
height: Goldenrods can grow up to 90 cm (3 ft) in height, while some species are just 10 cm (4 inches) tall.
soil_needs: Solidago grows best in well drained soil that is acidic to neutral.

color: Strelitzia flowers are bright orange, purple, red, yellow and dark blue.
height: Strelitzia can grow as tall as 1 m (3 ft) or taller, while some species (Strelitzia nicolai) can reach 10 metres (33 ft) high.
soil_needs: Strelitzia prefers organically rich, moist and well drained soil.

color: Although they get their common name from their most popular color, Lilacs can also be found in other colors, such as blue, red, pink, white and yellow.
height: Lilacs range in size from 2-10 metres (7-33 ft) high, depending on species.
soil_needs: Lilacs prefer fertile, moist, but well drained soil. The ideal soil pH for growing Lilacs is neutral to alkaline.

color: Tagetes come in shades of yellow, orange and even white.
height: Tagetes usually grow between 15-80 cm (6 inches to 3 ft) tall, rarely until 2 metres (7 ft).
soil_needs: Well drained.

color: Tanacetum flowers are usually white or yellow, depending on species.
height: Tanacetum plants can grow from a few inches to 150 cm (5 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Tanacetum prefers moist and well drained soil, but tolerates a wide variety of soils and pH conditions.

color: They come in bright yellow and white colors.
height: Taraxacum usually grow between 5-50 cm (2-20 inches) in height.
soil_needs: Although Dandelions adopt most conditions and grow everywhere, they grow best in moist areas with fertile, well drained soil.

color: Tigridia flowers may be red, yellow, white, cream, orange, scarlet, pink and mauve.
height: These plants usually grow between 30 and 60 cm (1-2 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Tigridia performs best in rich, well drained soils.

color: Torenia flowers come in shades of purple, blue, pink, yellow and white.
height: Torenia grows up to 30 cm (1 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Torenia prefers rich, loamy, moist and well drained soil. The plant is not particular about soil pH, but it does best in a soil that is slightly acidic.

color: Tricyrtis flowers come in shades of red, purple, white and yellow.
height: Tricyrtis reaches up to 90 cm (3 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Tricyrtis prefers rich, moist and well drained soil, with a pH from acid to neutral. The plant is adaptable and can tolerate heat, cold, and humidity.

color: Flower color varies from red, pink, maroon and purple to yellow and white.
height: They usually grow between 30-60 cm (1-2 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Trillium perform best in moist and well drained soil that is neutral to slightly acidic.

color: These beautiful flowers bloom in shades of yellow and orange.
height: Trollius can grow up to 90 cm (3 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Trollius prefer rich, poorly-drained soil and regular moisture.

color: Nasturtium comes in red, orange, yellow and cream color.
height: Nasturtium vary in height from 20 cm (8 inches) to 3 metres (10 ft), depending on species.
soil_needs: The plant is suitable for sandy and loamy soils with a pH between 5.5 and 7.5. They can grow in nutritionally poor soil.

color: You will find Tulips in nearly every color and pattern.
height: Tulips can be short (less than 20 cm or 8 inches), medium (20-45 cm or 8-18 inches) and tall (greater than 45 cm or 18 inches).
soil_needs: Tulips prefer fertile, moist, soft and well drained soil.

color: Its flowers are usually yellow in color.
height: The plant can grow up to 3 metres (10 ft) high.
soil_needs: Gorse grows on most soils, but will perform best in soil that is slightly acidic and sandy. It appreciates hot sun and dry, poor soils.

color: Ursinia have daisy-like yellow, red or orange flowers.
height: Ursinia can grow from 20 cm to 60 cm (8 inches to 2 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Ursinia prefers sandy, fertile and well drained soil.

color: Valeriana flowers are white, pink or lavender.
height: The plant can reach 1,5 meters (5 ft) in height.
soil_needs: The plant performs best in fertile, moist and well drained soil, with slightly acidic to neutral pH.

color: Verbascum flowers are primarily bright yellow, but also white, red, purple and pink.
height: Verbascum has a flower spike that reaches 3 metres (10 ft) high.
soil_needs: Grow Verbascum in well drained soil. Verbascum plants prefer slightly alkaline soil pH.

color: Verbena blooms in shades of violet, lavender, red, pink and white.
height: Verbena can grow from 7 cm to 180 cm (3 inches to 6 ft) tall.
soil_needs: Moist, but well drained.

color: Veronica come in shades of blue, purple, pink and white.
height: Veronica come in a wide range of sizes, from 10 cm to 2 metres (4 inches to 7 ft) in height.
soil_needs: This plant prefers moist, but well drained soil that is neutral, alkaline or acidic.

color: Veronicastrum flowers come in shades of white, purple and pink.
height: Veronicastrum reaches nearly 2 m (6 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Veronicastrum prefers fertile, moist and well drained soil. It tolerates a wide range of soil pH levels.

color: Vinca come in pink, purple, red and white colors.
height: Vinca plants range in size from dwarf species that grow only about 10 cm (4 inches) tall to the larger types which can grow up to 60 cm (2 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Vinca prefers moist, but well drained soil and is adaptable to soils of various pH.

color: As their name suggests, many species are violet in color, but can also be blue, white, yellow and cream. Some blooms have two or even three colors.
height: Violas are small plants up to 20 cm (8 inches) tall.
soil_needs: Violas prefer a rich, moist and well drained soil.

color: Watsonia flowers come in shades of red, pink, orange, purple and white.
height: Watsonia range from 30 cm to 2 metres (1 ft to 7 ft) in height.
soil_needs: The soil should be acidic or neutral and should be moist and well drained.

color: Weigela flowers come in red, pink, white and yellow.
height: Weigela species range from 30 cm (1 ft) to 3 metres (10 ft) high.
soil_needs: Weigela prefers fertile and moist, but well drained soil.

color: Wisteria come in shades of white, blue, purple and pink.
height: Wisterias can grow from 180 cm to 12 metres (6 to 40 ft) high.
soil_needs: Wisteria likes moist, well drained and fertile soil. It grows best in slightly acidic to neutral soil.

color: Xanthisma flowers are generally yellow in color, but there are also varieties that are white and purple.
height: The plant can reach a height of 60 cm (2 ft).
soil_needs: Xanthisma prefers well-drained, sandy soils and can survive in dry soil as well. The soil pH can vary from 5.0. to 7.0.

color: Xeranthemum flowers come in shades of pink, purple and white.
height: Xeranthemum can grow between 30 and 90 cm (1-3 ft) tall.
soil_needs: The plant prefers fertile, moist and well drained soil.

color: Xerochrysum bracts come in shades of yellow, orange, purple, pink and red. The tiny individual flowers are usually yellow in color.
height: Xerochrysum grows 20 to 150 cm (8 inches to 5 ft) tall, depending on species.
soil_needs: Xerochrysum prefers soil with a pH of 5.5 to 7.5, but the plant grows in nearly any well-drained soil.

color: This plant has unique cream-colored flowers.
height: These species can grow from 50 cm to 1.5 meters (2-5 ft) tall, with a numerous small flowers growing on a stalk.
soil_needs: Xerophyllum prefers sandy or loamy soil that is well drained.

color: The Yucca plant has green, sword-like leaves and white or whitish flowers.
height: Yucca can grow from 60 cm to 4,5 metres (2 to 15 ft) high.
soil_needs: Yucca grows best in sandy and well drained soil, with a pH between 5.5 and 7.5.

color: Zantedeschia is available in a multitude of colors including white, yellow, orange, pink, purple and even black.
height: Zantedeschia can grow between 30 and 90 cm (1 to 3 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Zantedeschia grows best in moist and well drained soil. The ideal soil pH is from 6.0 to 6.5.

color: Zephyranthes flowers may be yellow, pink and white.
height: Zephyranthes can grow up to 30 cm (1 ft) in height.
soil_needs: Zephyranthes prefers well drained soil with a good application of organic material.

color: Zinnia flowers are known for their vivid colors. They are often multi-colored and may be yellow, orange, white, red, pink and purple.
height: Zinnias range in size from dwarf species (just 17 cm or 7 inches) to giants (120 cm or 4 ft).
soil_needs: Zinnias prefer fertile and moist, but well drained soil with a pH between 5.5 and 7.5.

color: Zygopetalum have unusually colored flowers in shades of blue, purple, red and white.
height: Zygopetalum usually grows to a height of 40 cm (1-2 ft).
soil_needs: The plant prefers moist and well drained soil. with a pH level between 5.5 and 6.5.
